=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: ₹1.58 lakh crore exodus: India stock market sees highest-ever FPI outflows in 2025
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 13:29
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Foreign portfolio investors sold ₹22,130 worth of Indian stocks in December 2025, contributing to a total outflow of ₹1,58,407 crore for the year. Meanwhile, domestic institutional remain invested, supporting the market amid declining FPI sentiment.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://www.livemint.com/market/stock-market-news/rs-1-58-lakh-crore-exodus-india-stock-market-sees-highest-ever-fpi-outflows-in-2025-11766924165270.html
